summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 12, Renton's Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue and 17th Avenue, from East Pike Street to 17th Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12889 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
